title: Citing Textual Evidence

content.title: Evidence Mastery
steps: Step 1: Answer the main question first.
Step 2: Predict what kind of evidence supports it.
Step 3: Test each line reference: does it PROVE your answer?
Step 4: Eliminate lines that are true but off-topic.
